# Tech Fundemental

All the information presented here was collected from the [Tech Fundamentals course](https://learn.cantrill.io/p/tech-fundamentals) by [Adrian Cantrill](https://linkedin.com/in/adriancantrill). I summarized the material to make it easier for myself and others to review it quickly; however, I recommend taking the course itself, as it is free of charge and provides much more detailed information.
